feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Flood Advisory issued October 27 at 8:56AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The following area, around Mendenhall Lake and river in Juneau. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
entry.cap:areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau

entry.title: High Wind Watch issued October 27 at 3:46AM AKDT until October 29 at 1:00AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Aleutians. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through late Friday night.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Eastern Aleutians

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 26 at 3:07PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS AND HEAVY RAIN EXPECTED FOR PORTIONS OF SE ALASKA FOR THE WEEKEND... Potential for a storm force low and front moving into the AK Gulf from the SW early Saturday. The low will weaken as it moves eastward by Sunday. Strong winds will impact the northeast gulf coast and northern panhandle Saturday through Sunday as the low
entry.cap:areaDesc: Admiralty Island; Annette Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Wrangell; City and Borough of Yakutat; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island

entry.cap:areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu

entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 27 at 10:31AM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Above Lake Harney affecting Seminole County. .The St. Johns River above Lake Harney at Geneva remains in Major Flood Stage. The river is forecast to continue a slow decline, dropping from Major to Moderate Flood Stage by this weekend. Interests along the river will continue to see major flood impacts,
entry.cap:areaDesc: Seminole

entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... entry.cap:areaDesc: Lake; Volusia

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued October 27 at 2:52AM PDT until October 27 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...North Coast. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT this afternoon.

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued October 27 at 2:52AM PDT until October 27 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...San Juan County, Western Whatcom County, Western Skagit County, Everett and Vicinity and Admiralty Inlet Area. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT this evening.
